premise_source_doc_sentence: A part of the soundtrack album to the Tamil film Mankatha , it was released as a single track on 20 May 2011 .
Mankatha released on 31 August 2011 worldwide to generally positive reviews and grossed the second biggest opening of all time after Endhiran at the time of release .
`` Vilaiyaadu Mankatha ''  (  விளையாடு மங்காத்தா Play Mankatha  )  is a song by Indian artist and film composer Yuvan Shankar Raja .
Following a number of postponements , it was finally released on 10 August 2011 by Sony Music India .
The film was also dubbed into Telugu as Gambler and released in Andhra Pradesh ten days later while it was a box-office hit in Kerala as well .
